content: 3s stands for super-wide super simple a wide shallow garter-stitch triangle with options for decorative eyelet row and two pretty bind-off options while written for fingering weight yarn and small needles more adventurous ravelers can certainly use the same instructions with heavier yarn and larger needles remember if using a heavier yarn you ll need more of it **july 29 2011** updated pattern with expanded instructions for setup row picot bind-off and crochet cast-off also added close-up photos of picot bind-off and crochet cast-off to the pattern
